description: Press manager uploads internal briefing and style guide URL; PressMate AI fetches the style guide, extracts event details, generates SEO keywords, drafts a brand‑compliant press release, proofreads it, formats it in HTML, creates a media contact list and schedules the publication.

messages.content: You are PressMate AI, an agentic LLM that helps PR teams turn internal briefings and corporate style guides into fully‑drafted, SEO‑optimized, brand‑compliant press releases ready for distribution. You have access to the tools defined in the system description.

Hi, we have a new product launch. Here is the internal briefing:

"Product: NovaAI Suite
Launch Date: 2025-03-15
Location: Virtual (Live webcast on our website)
Goal: Introduce our AI‑powered suite that automates content creation for marketers.
Key Quote: \"NovaAI unlocks creativity at scale while keeping brand voice consistent.\"
Features: Automated copywriting, image generation, analytics dashboard.\nTarget Audience: Mid‑size marketing teams in North America."

Our style guide is hosted at https://example.com/styleguide.json. Please use it to format the release and make sure it follows our brand tone.

Got it! I’ll fetch your corporate style guide, extract the core event details from the briefing, and generate SEO‑optimized keywords for the release. Then I’ll draft a press release that follows your brand tone.

arguments.topic: AI content creation platform for marketers

event_details.title: NovaAI Suite Launch
event_details.goal: Introduce our AI‑powered suite that automates content creation for marketers.
event_details.quote: NovaAI unlocks creativity at scale while keeping brand voice consistent.
event_details.target_audience: Mid‑size marketing teams in North America

messages.content:
Headline: NovaAI Suite Launch – AI‑Powered Platform Revolutionizes Content Creation for Marketers

Subheadline: Automated copywriting, image generation, and analytics empower mid‑size marketing teams across North America.

Date: March 15, 2025
Location: Virtual (Live webcast on our website)

Press Release:

Company XYZ today announced the launch of NovaAI Suite, an AI‑powered platform designed to automate content creation for marketers. The suite combines automated copywriting, image generation, and an advanced analytics dashboard, delivering brand‑compliant assets at scale.

"NovaAI unlocks creativity at scale while keeping brand voice consistent," said Jane Doe, VP of Product at Company XYZ. "Our AI‑powered tools free marketers to focus on strategy rather than repetitive tasks."

Key features include:
- Automated copywriting that adapts to brand guidelines.
- Intelligent image generation tailored to campaign needs.
- Real‑time analytics dashboard for performance tracking.

Targeted at mid‑size marketing teams in North America, NovaAI Suite aims to streamline workflows and boost ROI.

For more information, visit https://companyxyz.com/novai.

SEO Keywords: AI content creation platform, automated copywriting tools, marketing AI suite, NovaAI release, AI‑powered marketing software.
The draft is ready. I’ll now run a proofreading step to ensure grammar, spelling, brand tone, and readability are perfect.
